OOC: Actually he was planning to use that consealed laser sword to 
take a bot hostage later and get his other weapons back and escape 
without sheading any fellow Maximal blood or whatever they have.

BIC:  A plan occured to Sunhawk.  If he could find the Ark here maybe 
he could convince Optimus Prime of his innocence and be granted 
amnasty for his crimes.

Sunhawk:  By the way like I said before the Preds framed me for 
murder and treason I was a lutenient.  Do you plan to give me that 
rank back or am I just a private again.  Of course I'm sure they 
alerted every outpost this side of the Sharkticons planet of who I 
was and what I'd supposedly done as soon as I escaped from prison.

He tried to bring the backup systems on line.

Sunhawk: You do realize most of this stuff was obsolete 6 months ago 
don't you?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> Condor: Condor appeared in brigde and said to Maximal 
leader "Condor reports, sir... What's the situation?" 
> 
> {Talos}
> Bridge
> 
>     Talos looked back over his shoulder from the battered remains 
of the weapons and defense systems computer, his eyes passing over 
Sunhawk who still seemed to want to go to the brig, to the two new 
bots standing on deck. Looking over Condor and Siref. "Stand easy 
Siref, well as you can see we've crashed. I've got some bots..." 
Looking pointedly at Sunhawk, indicating he should get to work on 
helping Hot Rod, "... working on repairs, others are going to go 
through the ship and see who's still functioning."
> 
>     As Sunhawk got to work after discharging himself of weapons he 
answered, "That's why I want sensors up, Maximal command seemed to 
think a group of Predicons were headed back to ancient Earth, I 
suspect that's where we've crashed but I can't be sure, never been to 
the place myself. Once we have external sensors working again we can 
find out if this is the right planet and if so where we've been 
forced to land."
> 
>     Moving to a locker in the floor by one of the chairs he 
extracts a small repair kit and opens the computers panel shifting 
under the console to get at the wiring. "Siref and Condor you two 
should check out the thruster section of the ship, see if anything 
can be salvaged, if anyone needs assistance to the CR chambers on 
deck two get them there first, by all reports the thrusters are just 
so much slag..." Turning back to his work Talos begins rejoining the 
connections under the computer panel using a small hand torch to fuse 
the bypassed lines together to make the connection stable before 
trying the computer once more.
